project.description:
#Trigger command curl -X POST "http://voltha:11777ff9b4b53d3b0ed4eb08b206214c9e@172.17.10.64:8080/job/3_Install_Bal_Psme/buildWithParameters?PLTFORM=asgvolt64&ONL_ID=b4af32e&PSME_VER=2.1.3.59.24&BAL_SDK_VER=3.2.2.2&MDATE=2019-12-10"
Install BAL SDK - Modify NNI port from 100G 40G. - Add ma1 as dhcp type. Install PSME Start daemon and unitest tool to let ONU to O5 state.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command: #!/bin/bash #Wait into ONL env. c=100 #c=1 while [ $c != 0 ];do c=$(($c-1)) sleep 1 echo $c done

buildStep.command:
#!/bin/bash #Above IP need modify to DUT's IP address echo "ONL_COMMIT_ID[$ONL_ID]" echo "PLTFORM[$PLTFORM]" echo "PSME_VER[$PSME_VER]" echo "BAL_SDK_VER[$BAL_SDK_VER]" echo "MDATE[$MDATE]"
cd / ##Remove exist deamon or server ## ntpdate -s time.stdtime.gov.tw tar zxvf release_*.tar.gz dpkg -i psme-allinone*.deb update-rc.d psme defaults cp /libbal_host_api.so /lib/
service psme start
# Insert BAL kernel module every time before startup. sed -i '/^exit 0/i \/opt\/bcm68620\/svk_init.sh' /etc/rc.local
# Use dhcp client to get IP address. sed -i '/^exit 0/i dhclient ma1' /etc/rc.local
# GPON NNI PORTs set to 40G sed -i 's/port ce128 speed=100000/port ce128 speed=40000/g' /broadcom/qax.soc
sed -i 's/port ce129 speed=100000/port ce129 speed=40000/g' /broadcom/qax.soc
#ONU ID sed -i 's/71E80110/428DA323/g' /broadcom/onu_cfg
cd /opt/bcm68620/ ./svk_init.sh
cd /broadcom/ export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=$LD_LIBRARY_PATH:/broadcom nohup ./dev_mgmt_daemon -d -pcie < /dev/null > /dev/null 2>&1 & sleep 10 cd /broadcom/ nohup ./unittest_psme-chassis_acc_api_bal3_dist_test < /dev/null > /dev/null 2>&1 & c=180 #c=1 while [ $c != 0 ];do c=$(($c-1)) sleep 1 echo $c done exit 0
